Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), dh-sequence-fortran-mod, gfortran | fortran-compiler, chrpath, hwloc-nox, libhwloc-dev, librdmacm-dev [!hurd-i386], libslurm-dev [!hurd-i386], libibverbs-dev (>= 1.1.7) [!hurd-i386], libfabric-dev [!hurd-i386 !powerpc !sh4 !x32], libnuma-dev [!hurd-i386], libucx-dev [amd64 ppc64el arm64], libpmix-dev, libxt-dev, procps, python3, txt2man, valgrind [i386 amd64 powerpc armhf], x11proto-core-dev
Package-List: libmpich-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any libmpich12 deb libs optional arch=any mpich deb devel optional arch=any mpich-doc deb doc optional arch=all
